channel.title: Dictation of Task
channel.description: Hello, I use the dictation function to create Drafts on my apple watch and in works great . How can I dictate tasks? Is this possible? (In german) Thanks a lot Inge

item.title: Dictation of Task
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
As a starting point, maybe this discussion will help?
